name: ListJobTemplates
description:
Retrieve all active and inactive job templates.

Use this tool to obtain a list of all job templates, both active and inactive. Useful for managing and reviewing job templates. Requires 'jobsRead' permission.

parameters.name: job_template_request_body
parameters.description: A JSON object for the request body. Currently, no data is required here.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API
